TopicTitle: Tracking Station Going Wonky - Ruining Saves

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

The other day my tracking station has started going wonky. I can delete debris, however, I cannot terminate any manned flight (the dialogue box about killing the crew comes up, but when I click "terminate" the box stays there, and I will be unable to exit the tracking station because of it). I also cannot switch to any flight or debris - if I try either nothing happens, or the game will say "Focus - (nearest celestial body)" and then zoom out at light speed. At this point if I exit and reenter the tracking station, no tracked objects appear and the UI is messed up.

This started happening suddenly, no recent changes as far as mods or anything, and it's destroyed 2 save games on me.

Just part mods - SpaceY, station parts, FASA, KW Rocketry + community fixes, USI, tantares, ship manifest. The last mod I installed was hyperedit but it worked fine for weeks.

Did a fresh install and the problem persists.

It's similar to a problem I've been having: the ships do not show up in the flight gui (as in the diamond selectors don't show up) and the last thing I have done with my install was installing Alternis Kerbol five weeks ago. Must be a OS update or something.

It's similar to a problem I've been having: the ships do not show up in the flight gui (as in the diamond selectors don't show up) and the last thing I have done with my install was installing Alternis Kerbol five weeks ago. Must be a OS update or something.

Is there a mod that replaces or emulates tracking station functionality?
